resources.string: Before this webapp can be installed, a version of I-Jetty appropriate to your Android release level must be installed. The easiest way to determine an appropriate version and install it is from the Android Marketplace.

This is the installer for the Console WebApp for I-Jetty.

I-Jetty is the port of Jetty, the popular open-source web container for the Android environment. When installed into I-Jetty, this web application makes available information from your phone over the web. This means that you can browse and control your phone from your desktop browser, or any other device sharing the same LAN as the phone.

 For more information about I-Jetty and further example web applications integrated with Android APIs, please visit http://code.google.com/p/i-jetty/.

For commercial support or custom developments based on I-Jetty please visit http://www.intalio.com/jetty.
I-Jetty is not installed. Please install it first before installing this webapp.
